### view() {#a3450486526981b8bc661900c572fa689}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void RegionInfo::view ()">
Opens a viewer to show the GraphViz visualization of the regions.

Useful during debugging as an alternative to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regioninfobase/#a215b26a0bc3e7048bc79ef21db564b1f">dump()</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/regioninfo-h/#l00930">930</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/regioninfo-h">RegionInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/regioninfo-cpp/#l00110">110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/regioninfo-cpp">RegionInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### viewOnly() {#a73040699f8b44e373884e6c439b757ac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void RegionInfo::viewOnly ()">
Opens a viewer to show the GraphViz visualization of this region without instructions in the BasicBlocks.

Useful during debugging as an alternative to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regioninfobase/#a215b26a0bc3e7048bc79ef21db564b1f">dump()</a>.
